tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crop_data (
  crop_id INT,
  crop_name VARCHAR(255),
  market_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
  sales_volume INT,
  investment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE market_analysis (
   market_id INT,
   crop_name VARCHAR(255),
   market_price DECIMAL,
   sales_volume INT,
   market_trend VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE crop_inventory (
   inventory_id INT,
   crop_name VARCHAR(255),
   quantity INT,
   date_added DATE,
   location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE investment_data (
   investment_id INT,
   crop_name VARCHAR(255),
   investment_amount DECIMAL,
   return_rate DECIMAL,
   investment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE crops (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(255),
    crop_type VARCHAR(255),
    market_price DECIMAL,
    quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE sales (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT REFERENCES crops(id),
    sale_date DATE,
    sale_price DECIMAL,
    sold_quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE investments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investment_type VARCHAR(255),
    investment_amount DECIMAL,
    investment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE market_trends (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_date DATE,
    market_analysis TEXT
)
